title: Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes          Fees and Passes The Martin Luther King, Jr. Memorial has no fees or reservations associated with a visit. Please visit the National Mall and Memorial Parks Fees and Passes page for information on Fees and Passes parkwide.  Â       Permits & Reservations Some activities may require a special permit such as weddings, commercial photography and demonstrations. Please visit the parkwide Permits & Reservations page for more information on obtaining a permit.
